author: Elizabeth Leader Smith
title: 36 Essential Austin Patios Near SXSW
text:
36 Essential Austin Patios Near SXSW All Mar 8, 2017, 2:30pm CST Hangar Lounge Hangar Lounge/Facebook 
March in Austin was made for outdoor eating and drinking. The city is teeming with all sort of patios to fit your SXSW needs, from front-and-center places to be seen and little gems where you can hide away. Now is the time to take advantage of the cityâ€™s best patios near the festival for excellent people-watching and celebrity-sighting. 
Find shaded space at places like Blue Dahlia , which offers a meal and welcome retreat from the madness inherent to the festival. Grab a quick drink while still staying in the whirling chaos at a place like Banger's . Check out low-key drinking holes like Violet Crown Social Club to stylish (albeit pricer) spots boasting creative cocktails and memorable meals like La Condesa . 
Be warned and check ahead: these restaurants and bars might be bought out for private events and parties, but never fear, Austin has patios galore . 
Everything below is listed alphabetically for ease. Is your favorite SXSW-adjacent patio missing from this round-up? Hit up the tipline , comments, or make a case over on the forum . 1 Banger's Sausage House & Beer Garden 
The beer garden has plenty of space (and even a covered porch) perfect for SXSW crowds.
